mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.cust_no custNo, t.acc_no accNo, t.accounting_no accountingNo, t.receive_balance receiveBalance, t.receive_principal receivePrincipal, t.receive_interest receiveInterest, t.return_principal returnPrincipal, t.return_interest returnInterest, t.trade_date tradeDate, t.trade_time tradeTime, t.balance balance, t.freeze_amount freezeAmount, t.available_amount availableAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_accounting_lend_asset t
mapper.select: WHERE t.repay_count=${repayCount} AND DATE_ADD(t.modify_time,INTERVAL 20 HOUR ) < NOW() and t.repay_result=98060003
